price: اور اگر ہم چاہتے تو انہیں ڈبو دیتے۔ پھر نہ تو کوئی ان کا فریاد رس ہوتا نہ وه بچائے جائیں.
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: Urdu Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Urdu by Muhammad Ibrahim Gunakry. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
